00019 class Error {
00020 public:
00021     inline static std::string SysErrString()  { return std::strerror(errno); }
00022 
00023 public:
00024 protected:
00025     template <typename AnyType>
00026     inline AnyType ErrWrap(AnyType expr) const {
00027         if ((int)expr < 0) _err_string = SysErrString();
00028         return expr;
00029     }
00030 
00031     template <typename AnyType>
00032     inline AnyType ErrWrapPointer(AnyType expr) const {
00033         if (!_err_string.empty()) _err_string.clear();
00034         return expr;
00035     }
00036 
00037     inline void SetErrString(char const* char_str)   const { _err_string = char_str; }
00038     inline void SetErrString(std::string const& str) const { _err_string = str; }
00039 
00040 public:
00041     inline std::string const& ErrString() const { return _err_string; }
00042 
00043 protected:
00044     mutable std::string _err_string;
00045 };
